data.text: Gweye Imulungu wa nhogolwa zangu sikuunyamale,
kwavija wanhu wehile na wavizi onilonga vihile,
Ona, kwa mbuli za kubezeli wanizunguluka,
Oniliha gehile kwa unogelo wangu,
Waniliha gehile hanhu ha ganogile,
Mwike msemi yehile mbuli ya imunhu yonihila,
Mkitala yoneke kabananga,
Siku zake za kukala ziwe ndodo,
Wanage wawe wakiwa,
Wanage wawe tanga nzulule na wapule,
Imunhu yomdai yasole vinhu vose viyeli navo,
Sikuyawe na munhu wa kumonela bazi,
Ulelo wake wose usegele,
Gehile ga iwahenga zake gakumbukwe mgameso ga Mndewa Imulungu,
Mndewa Imulungu yazikumbuke nzambi zao siku zose,
Kwavija munhu ayo hagesile kuwa na bazi,
Heyo kanogelwa kuduwila,
Kavala makungu kamba kiwalo chake.
Kumwake iwe kamba kiwalo cha kuigubika,
Mndewa Imulungu yawalihe gago awo wose onitagusa niye,
Gweye Mndewa Imulungu,
Kwavija niye na mkiwa na ngaengae,
Nobita kamba sisila disegelaga,
Mavindi gangu gadonha kwa kufunga kuja,
Niwa kinhu cha kubezeli kumwao,
Gweye Mndewa Imulungu, Imulungu wangu nitaze,
Waleke wajuwe kamba uno udahi wako,
Waleke waduwile,
Awo onitagusa ovazwa kinyala,
Nomshukulu Mndewa Imulungu kwa mulomo wangu,
Kwavija kokwima mkono wa ukudila wa mkiwa,
